episodes.description:
TIP OF THE DAY FROM A FORMER CULT MEMBER:
#cultawareness #cultsurvivor #dwellcommunitychurch #xenos #cults #cultprevention HOW TO GET MORE SEX INSIDE XENOS/DWELL ⚠️ WARNING SEXUAL CONTENT ADULT LANGUAGE 

Stop listening to wankers who aren't having sex guys. Listen to woman like me and the quiet husbands in there that are actually getting laid who love and like their wives. 
Xenos/Dwell has gotten away with pretending to be a normal church for too long so heres some of their weird cult sex stuffs and advice to those inside being told stuffs thats out there and unnecessary. 
Xenos/Dwells founding family always takes a good thing and selfishly ruin it...ESPECIALLY SEX #weirdcultsexstuff

episodes.title: Overwhelmed with sorrow inside or outside of Dwell?  #cultawareness #cultprevention #cults
episodes.description:
A message for those who have been overwhelmed with sorrow inside or outside of Dwell. To the good Christians inside of Dwell, please consider Like Paul would do... confronting the selfish McCallum family for mistreating you in so many ways. Consider and discuss bringing the family  before the church the way they like it done and rebuke them before the congregation for once and consider getting rid of rigid controlling miserable ministry houses, stop humiliating people in detail in groups it traumatizes everyone but bullies that love it like the superbowl event at Xenos/Dwell that it is to them. Also consider demanding some basic privacy and rights as members especially your time and work commitments and start hopping around groups/nights/times take some nights off for no reason but self care and throw out the unnecessary micromanaged McCallums schedule for your lives thats the same as its been since the 70s. The McCallums treat you like worker bees with no respite and the selfishness needs addressed especially how they treat the grieving and abused spouses. Make that family give you respite and consider stepping them down honestly. You deserve better. Those who left and were humiliated you didn't deserve that and please dont be overwhelmed with sorrow anymore. You are a beautiful person and the selfish cult family never deserved you.  It is time for the family to start serving the church instead of the church serving them and they can start by taking some accountability instead of the same hubris since the two name changes ago back in the 70s..question their priorities the way they unabashedly question ALL of yours. Making public to share and so Xenos/Dwell Community church can add this to my file.
#dwellcommunitychurchisacult #dwellcommunitychurch #cultawareness #cultprevention #cults

 #dwellcommunitychurchisacult #dwellcommunitychurch #cultawareness #cultprevention #cults

episodes.title: A TALE OF TWO WANKERS ⚠️ Weird cult sex stuff
episodes.description:
Tip Of The Day From A Former Cult Member
Trigger ⚠️  Sexual/adult content and LANGUAGE 
Like I say in the video I dont like this bizarre cult sex stuff topic but the weird cult family does so....
A Tale Of Two Wankers
The secret storys of family hypocrisy in Dwell Community church formerly known as Xenos Christian Fellowship 
Wanker 1: Dennis Mccallum founding member (the cult leader)
Wanker 2: Ryan Lowery Elder and son in law of Dennis. Ryan is aka the biggest bully in Xenos/Dwell and u will see why
Both are public figures who sell books

 I clap back at the bully cult leader for insulting survivors who leave their cult. The family has a bizarre voyeuristic version of communal confession that is horrific abuse and violation of members privacy while always protecting their own.

If you were humiliated in Xenos Dwell this video is for you. I hope you feel validated and know that it matters what happened to you members who are still inside and those now out of xenos/dwell. I CARE WHAT YOU WENT THROUGH 💔

I sat on this one as I have tiks in it and I rock so I'll go ahead and say that I have developed a neurological condition that gives me tiks and tourettes. It turns out u can get tourettes in your 40s. I try hard to only record when I'm not tikky, but its hard when I'm worked up. Im usually calmer in my former videos so I get animated too 😆 hope this explains some of my speaking errors and struggles . I worked hard to overcome my speaking to make these videos to help people. I got worked up because I listened to a former members Emma's story on a podcast. She endured crowded ministry houses for over a decade and sacrificed all her time devoted to that place and they shamed her for just kissing someone and also for having a fun classy photo shoot session. It inspired me to bring this familys hypocrisy to everyone's attention in detail the way the family likes it. Lets not keep their cult secrets anymore the way that they don't keep yours. Making public so you can feel free to share and so Xenos Dwell can add this to my file. #tourettes #cultawareness #cultsurvivor

episodes.title: Tip Of The DayFrom A Former Cult Member How Xenos/Dwell usesCriticism to control your loved ones
episodes.description:
Tip Of The Day
From A Former Cult Member 
How Xenos/Dwell uses
Criticism to control your loved ones inside. Watch for intense criticism in any group. I give a window inside How Dwell/Xenos   
uses criticism to control their members behavior and keep their mistreatment collectively private inside and outside of the group. Xenos has us believing inside that they are the only ones who truly know us and love us with the truth, especially the bad truths about ourselves that not even our parents love or know us enough to tell us like Xenos knows and loves us with the tough love we need to walk with God the McCallum way. (Excuse my speaking today I struggled a bit today) #cultawareness #cultsurvivor #cultsandextremebeliefs #cults #xenos #dwellcommunitychurch #osu

episodes.title: I am on a birthday hiatus... there are more cult tips to come soon. Thanks for the  support!
Repost with better audio
episodes.description:
Tip Of The Day From A Former Cult Member :Trigger ⚠️ SEXUAL/ADULT content.The topic today is dating and sexual privacy.  How Dwell/Xenos treats your loved ones and your privacy inside and I have come to believe that they use dating as an incentive to live the founding families rigid way. The stories I tell from inside are common and I know Dwell may have changed some things since I was there,  but the stories coming out from there today seem to be the same as when I attended in the 90s. I thought that the private things the founders daughter was telling me about private lives were just nuance because we were teens and she knew everything about people because of her dad, but I found later that everyone knew what I knew there, for the most part we all know each others sexual information or if not we can easily find out. Protect your own privacy in any group (especially Xenos/Dwell) and look for weird patterns of control and interference with dating in any too. I apologize for the laughter at a serious moment as the mail carrier popped up while I was filming. I hope this helps someone. As usual Im making this public for awareness and prevention  feel free to share and also as usual Dwell can feel free to add this to my file.
I am a Swifty so congrats to Taylor Swift & Travis Kelce for her engagement!  #taylorswiftengaged  #taylorswift #swifty #congratstaylorswift #TravisKelce

episodes.title: TIP OF THE DAY FROM A FORMER CULT MEMBER. TOPIC: PROTECT YOUR SPIRITUALITY FROM OTHERS.
episodes.description:
Tip of the day from a former cult member. Topic: Protect your spirituality from others. 
Spiritual council is not bad in itself, but it can be wrong sometimes like with what has taken years for me to deconstruct from the damage I let the cult Xenos/Dwell do to my personal spirituality and my head with ptsd that many of us have from there. Protect your heart and minds from any influence outside of your dialogue with what is divine to you and be cautious of spiritual council, especially from the know it alls. Hope this helps someone
trigger ⚠️ adult language #cultsurvivor #cultawareness #cults #tipoftheday #dwellcommunitychurchisacult #cultawareness #cultsurvivor #cults #cult #cultsandextremebeliefs #dwell #xenos #tipoftheday

episodes.title: CULT survivors of Dwell community church formerly known as Xenos
episodes.description:
All credit is to xenosdwellisacult on tiktok.  I am in this video with several victoms of the cult Dwell Community church formerly known as Xenos. They did a great job. i am sharing their work here.

"Cliff Pervocracy wrote a column called “The Missing Stair”, where he coined the phrase “the missing stair” as part of a metaphor to explain the phenomena of tolerating an abuser or harasser within one’s community, even though their behavior was generally well known. In the column, Cliff compared the malefactor to a known problem with a house – something that was unacceptable and dangerous, but allowed to continue – such as a staircase with no railing in a dark basement that happened to be missing a stair in the middle. While the staircase itself is a known danger, everyone in the house has become so used to its presence that they just remember to leap over that missing step whenever they have to take the stairs.

Xenos refuses to repair the missing stairs and continues to abuse countless people. We will continue to use our voices to collectively warn people about the missing stairs until they are repaired. 


#religioustrauma #spiritualabuse #dwellcc #xenosisacult #dwellisacult #dennismccallum #leavingdwell #614columbus #ohiostate #cult #cults #cultsurvivor "
